trans-unit.source: Provides a way to apply custom logic in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding" />.

To associate a converter with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>, create a class that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter> interface, and then implement the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.Convert%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per associare un convertitore di tipi con un <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>, creare una classe che implementa il <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter> interfaccia e quindi implementare il <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.Convert%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: Individual bindings in the collection can have their own value converters.
trans-unit.target: Le singole associazioni nella raccolta possono avere i propri convertitori di valori.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter>.
The array of values that the source bindings in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding" /> produces.
The value <see cref="F:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue" /> indicates that the source binding has no value to provide for conversion.
The type of the binding target property.
The converter parameter to use.
The culture to use in the converter.
Converts source values to a value for the binding target.
The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates the values from source bindings to the binding target.
A converted value.
If the method returns <see langword="null" />, the valid <see langword="null" /> value is used.
A return value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.<see cref="F:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue" />

indicates that the converter did not produce a value, and that the binding will use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue" /> if it is available, or else will use the default value.
A return value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" />.<see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing" />
indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue" /> or the default value.
The data binding engine does not catch exceptions that are thrown by a user-supplied converter.
trans-unit.target: Il motore di associazione di dati non rileva le eccezioni generate da un convertitore fornito dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Any exception that is thrown by the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.Convert%2A> method, or any uncaught exceptions that are thrown by methods that the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.Convert%2A> method calls, are treated as run-time errors.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi eccezione generata dal <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.Convert%2A> metodo o eventuali eccezioni non rilevate generate dai metodi che il <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.Convert%2A> chiamate al metodo, vengono considerati come errori di run-time.

trans-unit.source: Handle anticipated problems by returning <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>.<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>.
The value that the binding target produces.
The array of types to convert to.
The array length indicates the number and types of values that are suggested for the method to return.
The converter parameter to use.
The culture to use in the converter.
Converts a binding target value to the source binding values.
An array of values that have been converted from the target value back to the source values.
If there are more return values than there are bindings in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>, the excess return values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se sono presenti più valori restituiti rispetto alle associazioni nel <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>, i valori restituiti in eccesso vengono ignorati.

trans-unit.source: If there are more source bindings than there are return values, the remaining source bindings do not have any values set on them.
trans-unit.target: Se sono presenti più associazioni di origine di quanti sono i valori restituiti, i binding di origine rimanenti non dispone di tutti i valori impostati su di essi.

trans-unit.source: Types of return values are not verified against `targetTypes`; the values are set on the source bindings directly.
trans-unit.target: Tipi di valori restituiti non vengono verificati rispetto a `targetTypes`; i valori vengono impostati direttamente sulle associazioni di origine.

trans-unit.source: Return <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing> at position `i` to indicate that no value is to be set on the source binding at index `i`.
trans-unit.target: Restituire <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing> posizione `i` per indicare che nessun valore da impostare per l'associazione di origine in corrispondenza dell'indice `i`.

trans-unit.source: Return <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>.<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>
at position `i` to indicate that the converter is unable to provide a value for the source binding at index `i`, and that no value is to be set on it.
trans-unit.target: nella posizione `i` per indicare che il convertitore è in grado di fornire un valore per l'associazione di origine in corrispondenza dell'indice `i`, e che nessun valore deve essere impostato su di esso.

trans-unit.source: Return `null` to indicate that the converter cannot perform the conversion or that it does not support conversion in this direction.
trans-unit.target: Restituire `null` per indicare che il convertitore non è possibile eseguire la conversione o che non supporta la conversione in questa direzione.

trans-unit.source: The data binding engine does not catch exceptions that are thrown by a user-supplied converter.
trans-unit.target: Il motore di associazione di dati non rileva le eccezioni generate da un convertitore fornito dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Any exception that is thrown by the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> method or any uncaught exceptions that are thrown by methods that the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> method calls are treated as run-time errors.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi eccezione generata dal <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> metodo oppure non rilevate le eccezioni generate dai metodi che il <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> chiamate al metodo vengono considerate come errori di run-time.

trans-unit.source: Handle anticipated problems by returning `null`.
